# Advanced Computer Workstations for RCMP

## Tender Information

### Tender Details

* **Title**: Advanced Computer Workstations for RCMP
* **Reference Number**: SSC-22-00020402:T
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM017126/20402
* **Publication Date**: 2022-10-10
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-08T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not specified
* **Tender Status**: Expired

### Procurement Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and others
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

### Requirements

* **Delivery Location**: Edmonton, Alberta
* **Security Requirements**: Yes
* **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements**: Not applicable

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Rashawn Griffith
* **Contact Email**: Rashawn.Griffith@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: 3435499539
* **Contact Fax**: 613-9999999
* **Contact Address**: 180 Kent St. Ottawa K1P 0B6

### Attachments

* Please visit the link below to access the tender documents: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/F2948926-5823-44AD-A02A-0A9886BA45A0

Note: The rewritten entry has been condensed to include only the most relevant and necessary information. The formatting has been improved for better readability. 

Also note that I've removed some redundant and repetitive information such as the "tenderDescription" fields which seemed to contain the same information as the "tenderDetails" section. I've also reformatted the contact information to be more concise and easy to read. 

I've also removed the sections with "None" or empty fields as they were not necessary for the rewritten text. 

Let me know if this revised text meets your requirements.
